title: Web Developer Intern
description:
Web Developer Intern (Paid)
 



 Company: ZenithByte
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Duration: 3 Months
 



 Application Deadline: 23rd December 2025
 



 Opportunity: Full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



  





 About ZenithByte
 



 ZenithByte provides students and graduates with practical, hands\\-on experience in web development. We aim to empower aspiring developers by offering real\\-world, client\\-based projects that strengthen technical skills and build professional portfolios. Our mission is to bridge the gap between theoretical learning and industry\\-ready expertise.
 



  





 Responsibilities
 



 Assist in designing and developing responsive, user\\-friendly websites.
 



 Work with front\\-end and back\\-end frameworks to develop dynamic web applications.
 



 Test, debug, and optimize code for performance and seamless user experience.
 



 Collaborate with senior developers and designers on live projects.
 



 Learn and apply modern tools and technologies to improve development efficiency.
 



  





 Requirements
 



 Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
 



 Familiarity with frameworks like React, Angular, or Node.js (preferred).
 



 Basic knowledge of UI/UX principles and responsive design concepts.
 



 Strong communication, teamwork, and time\\-management skills.
 



 Passion for learning and building creative, functional web solutions.
 



  





 Stipend \\& Benefits
 



 Stipend: ‚Çπ7,500 \\- ‚Çπ15,000 (Performance\\-Based) (Paid)
 



 Hands\\-on experience with real\\-world web development projects.
 



 Certificate of Internship \\& Letter of Recommendation upon completion.
 



 Opportunity to build a strong professional portfolio with live project exposure.
 



  





 Equal Opportunity Statement
 



 ZenithByte is an equal\\-opportunity employer. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment.

title: AI ML Engineering Intern
description:
**Role Description** 








 This is a volunteer, remote role for an AI/ML Engineering Intern. The intern will assist in the development, testing, and optimization of AI/ML models, analyze and preprocess datasets, and contribute to building scalable machine learning pipelines. Additionally, the intern will participate in team meetings, share updates, and collaborate with other team members to drive the progress of AI/ML projects.
 



  





**Qualifications** 







* Strong knowledge of Machine Learning algorithms, Artificial Intelligence concepts, and data modeling techniques
* Hands\\-on experience with programming languages like Python, R, or similar
* Familiarity with frameworks/tools like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit\\-learn
* Understanding of data preprocessing techniques and experience working with large datasets
* Proficient problem\\-solving, analytical skills, and ability to debug code effectively
* Good communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work on a remote team
* Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field
* Passion for artificial intelligence and machine learning, with a desire to learn and grow in a fast\\-paced environment

title: R & D Test Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we‚Äôll give you what you need to make it happen. It won‚Äôt always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you‚Äôll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 R\\&D Team Lead
   

  

  

  

  

**Your role and responsibilities:**
 In this role, you will have the opportunity to contribute to ABB‚Äôs success with technology, software, product, and system development. Each day, you will identify and implement innovative solutions to relevant problems. You will also showcase your expertise by providing ideas and by being able to work both independently and as a part of a Research \\& Development (R\\&D) team.
   

  

 The work model for the role is:
   

  

 This role is contributing to the
 **Motion Business Drive Products Division in Bangalore, India**
**You will be mainly accountable for:**
* Identifying testing needs, executing test and driving the implementation of product and system test automation
* Participating in framing test strategy, selecting right tools, frameworks and executing automation of product testing in line with standard practices
* Being responsible for the test infrastructure, including virtual and physical test environment Searching for opportunities to improve test quality by identifying improvements and sharing of best practices
* Ability to write strong test cases by being creative and exploring challenging test scenarios
* Living ABB‚Äôs core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business


**Qualifications for the role:**
* BE or B.Tech in Electrical / Instrumentation / Electronics \\& Telecommunication engineering
* Minimum 3 to 7 years of experience in test automation and testing industrial automation software
* Good knowledge in drive engineering and testing
* Knowledge in programming, according to IEC 61131\\-3, Python and CODESYS
* Knowledge on manual and automation testing concepts, test automation tools and techniques Certification in ISTQB foundation level would be added advantage
* Having basic understanding on Azure DevOps, Jenkins, CI/ CD process and C\\# language
* Should have excellent problem\\-solving skills, ability to work both in team and independently


**More about us:**
 ABB Drive Products is a technology leader serving industries, infrastructure and machine builders with world\\-class drives and soft starters. With our products, global scale and local presence, we help our customers to improve energy efficiency, productivity and safety. Our people and culture are the foundation of our success. We all together make the difference for our customers every day.
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Specialist, PDF & eSignature
description:
**Hi,** 




  





**We have a exciting opportunity for PDF \\& Electronic Signatures Specialist in MSD Hyderabad** 




  





  





**The Opportunity** 




  





 ‚Ä¢ Based in Hyderabad, join a global healthcare biopharma company and be part of a 130\\- year legacy of success backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Be part of an organisation driven by digital technology and data\\-backed approaches that support a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines, and animal health products.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Drive innovation and execution excellence. Be a part of a team with passion for using data, analytics, and insights to drive decision\\-making, and which creates custom software, allowing us to tackle some of the world's greatest health threats.
 



 Our Technology Centres focus on creating a space where teams can come together to deliver business solutions that save and improve lives. An integral part of our company‚Äôs IT operating model, Tech Centres are globally distributed locations where each IT division has employees to enable our digital transformation journey and drive business outcomes. These locations, in addition to the other sites, are essential to supporting our business and strategy.
 



 A focused group of leaders in each Tech Center helps to ensure we can manage and improve each location, from investing in growth, success, and well\\-being of our people, to making sure colleagues from each IT division feel a sense of belonging to managing critical emergencies. And together, we must leverage the strength of our team to collaborate globally to optimize connections and share best practices across the Tech Centres.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 Under the direction of the Product Manager, this role will encompass engineering and delivery of enterprise solutions for PDF and electronic signatures. This role is critical in shaping the infrastructure and solution delivery aimed at enhancing the overall experience of our services. This position requires an individual who can execute delivery of the product roadmap as well as resolution of technical issues. The ideal candidate will possess a global mindset and demonstrate an ability to collaborate effectively with international teams and business units. The role will be an integral part of a high\\-performing global team and requires an individual who excels in relationship and process management across various areas within a highly regulated pharmaceutical setting.
 



  





  





**Primary job responsibilities include:** 




  





 ‚Ä¢Engineer, manage and test electronic signature enterprise applications.
 



 ‚Ä¢Manage, test and release Adobe desktop enterprise application for packaging and deployment.
 



 ‚Ä¢Manage the baseline configurations for electronic signatures.
 



 ‚Ä¢Test new feature releases in lower and production environments.
 



 ‚Ä¢Maintain records of configuration changes, tests, and releases.
 



 ‚Ä¢Drive vendor escalations and work closely with internal stakeholders to drive issue resolution.
 



 ‚Ä¢Work with end users, business areas and other stakeholders.
 



 ‚Ä¢Own third and fourth level support to identify root causes and develop strategic solutions for requests, change process requests (CPRs), and outages
 



 ‚Ä¢Prepare technical documentation, processes and procedures.
 



 ‚Ä¢Execute global standards, policies, and Service Level Agreements (SLA) for the product and ensure adherence to policies.
 



 ‚Ä¢Communicate technical information clearly to non\\-technical audiences.
 



 ‚Ä¢Support onboarding and enablement of users for electronic signature tools.
 



 ‚Ä¢Document common issues, resolutions, and user guides to improve self\\-service and reduce ticket volume.
 



  





**What should you have** 




 We are seeking professionals with the following qualifications, skills, and experience:
 



 Education Minimum Requirement:
 



 ‚Ä¢Bachelor‚Äôs degree or relevant experience in Computer Science, Computer Science Engineering, Math, or equivalent experience.
 



 Required Experience and Skills:
 



 ‚Ä¢
 **A minimum of 4 years of hands\\-on experience in engineering electronic signature enterprise solutions.** 




**‚Ä¢A minimum of 4 years of practical experience in engineering and supporting Windows, and Mac environments in large enterprises.** 




**‚Ä¢A minimum of 3 years of practical experience ensuring solutions are engineered with security compliance, governance adherence, and standards in large enterprises.** 




**‚Ä¢Proficiency in documenting and maintaining Standard Operating Procedures, Work Instructions, and System Development Lifecycle Management processes.** 




 ‚Ä¢Extensive technical troubleshooting capabilities.
 



 ‚Ä¢The ability to effectively communicate with various project stakeholders, including leadership, business customers, team members, and other IT colleagues.
 



 ‚Ä¢Strong intellectual curiosity and a demonstrated capacity for professional growth.
 



 ‚Ä¢Good understanding of document workflows.
 



 ‚Ä¢Exceptional technical and analytical skills with the capacity to swiftly assimilate new technologies.
 



 ‚Ä¢Ability to write technical documentation.
 



 Desired Experience and Skills:
 



 ‚Ä¢Ability to take initiative and function with minimal supervision in a highly demanding environment
 



 ‚Ä¢Work experience within the biopharma industry and/or other regulated environments
 



  





**Who we are** 




 We are known as Merck \\& Co., Inc., Rahway, New Jersey, USA in the United States and Canada and MSD everywhere else. For more than a century, we have been inventing for life, bringing forward medicines and vaccines for many of the world's most challenging diseases. Today, our company continues to be at the forefront of research to deliver innovative health solutions and advance the prevention and treatment of diseases that threaten people and animals around the world.
 



  





**What we look for** 




 Imagine getting up in the morning for a job as important as helping to save and improve lives around the world. Here, you have that opportunity. You can put your empathy, creativity, digital mastery, or scientific genius to work in collaboration with a diverse group of colleagues who pursue and bring hope to countless people
 



 who are battling some of the most challenging diseases of our time. Our team constantly evolving, so if you are among the intellectually curious, join us‚Äîand start making your impact today.

title: Software Engineer, AVP
description:
Join us as a Software Engineer
   

  

* This is an opportunity for a driven Software Engineer to take on an exciting new career challenge
* Day\\-to\\-day, you'll build a wide network of stakeholders of varying levels of seniority
* It‚Äôs a chance to hone your existing technical skills and advance your career
* We're offering this role at associate vice president level


 What you'll do
   

  

 In your new role, you‚Äôll engineer and maintain innovative, customer centric, high performance, secure and robust solutions. You‚Äôll be working within a feature team and using your extensive experience to engineer software, scripts and tools that are often complex, as well as liaising with other engineers, architects and business analysts across the platform.
   

  

**You‚Äôll Also Be**
* Producing complex and critical software rapidly and of high quality which adds value to the business
* Working in permanent teams who are responsible for the full life cycle, from initial development, through enhancement and maintenance to replacement or decommissioning
* Collaborating to optimise our software engineering capability
* Designing, producing, testing and implementing our working code
* Working across the life cycle, from requirements analysis and design, through coding to testing, deployment and operations


 The skills you'll need
   

  

 You‚Äôll need at least eight years of experience in software engineering, software design, architecture, and an understanding of how your area of expertise supports our customers.
   

  

**You‚Äôll Also Need**
* Experience of working with development and testing tools, bug tracking tools and wikis
* Experience in Java, Microservices, AWS and SQL
* Experience of DevOps, Testing and Agile methodology and associated toolsets
* A background in solving highly complex, analytical and numerical problems
* Experience of implementing programming best practice, especially around scalability, automation, virtualisation, optimisation, availability and performance

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**About The Job**
 The Red Hat Ecosystems Engineering group is seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing team in Pune, India. In this role, you will work with a diverse team of highly motivated engineers on certification tooling integration and development supporting Red Hat Enterprise Linux and Red Hat‚Äôs AI platforms. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will work closely with the Product Engineering and Product Management teams to ensure integration and feature development of high\\-quality, technically polished tools for partners and developers.
   

  

**What you will do?**
* Research and collaborate on the integration and development of certification policies with subject matter experts and product managers for advanced hardware systems and components supporting Red Hat AI platforms
* Assist with integration and development of certification tests to verify enablement of Red Hat partner‚Äôs hardware systems and components with RHEL and Red Hat‚Äôs AI platforms
* Test advancing Red Hat AI platforms utilizing pytorch, vLLM and performance monitoring tools
* Work with Red Hat‚Äôs partners to certify hardware compatibility in RHEL for key features such as networking, storage, and GPU acceleration of AI applications
* Deliver continuous integration and feature enhancements in an agile framework producing automated test software packaged as RPMs and container images


**What you will bring?**
* 5\\+ years of relevant technical experience
* Strong experience with RHEL or other Linux distributions
* Experience with hardware integration and support in Linux
* Experience with building and running containers
* Some experience in Python software development and best practices
* Experience with Kubernetes
* Technical leadership acumen in a global team environment
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills; fluent English language skills


**The Following Is Considered a Plus**
* Recent hands on experience with distributed computation, either at the end\\-user or infrastructure provider level
* Background in DevOps or site reliability engineering (SRE)
* Experience with performance analysis tools
* Experience with Linux kernel development
* Experience with hardware accelerators (e.g., GPUs, FPGAs) for AI workloads is a plus
* Experience with AI/ML technologies and frameworks (classifiers, pytorch, tensorflow etc) is a plus


**About Red Hat**
 Red Hat is the world‚Äôs leading provider of enterprise open source software solutions, using a community\\-powered approach to deliver high\\-performing Linux, cloud, container, and Kubernetes technologies. Spread across 40\\+ countries, our associates work flexibly across work environments, from in\\-office, to office\\-flex, to fully remote, depending on the requirements of their role. Red Hatters are encouraged to bring their best ideas, no matter their title or tenure. We're a leader in open source because of our open and inclusive environment. We hire creative, passionate people ready to contribute their ideas, help solve complex problems, and make an impact.
   

  

**Inclusion at Red Hat**
 Red Hat‚Äôs culture is built on the open source principles of transparency, collaboration, and inclusion, where the best ideas can come from anywhere and anyone. When this is realized, it empowers people from different backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences to come together to share ideas, challenge the status quo, and drive innovation. Our aspiration is that everyone experiences this culture with equal opportunity and access, and that all voices are not only heard but also celebrated. We hope you will join our celebration, and we welcome and encourage applicants from all the beautiful dimensions that compose our global village.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Policy (EEO)**
 Red Hat is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer. We review applications for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, veteran status, genetic information, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, or any other basis prohibited by law.
   

  

 Red Hat does not seek or accept unsolicited resumes or CVs from recruitment agencies. We are not responsible for, and will not pay, any fees, commissions, or any other payment related to unsolicited resumes or CVs except as required in a written contract between Red Hat and the recruitment agency or party requesting payment of a fee.
   

  

 Red Hat supports individuals with disabilities and provides reasonable accommodations to job applicants. If you need assistance completing our online job application, email application\\-assistance@redhat.com. General inquiries, such as those regarding the status of a job application, will not receive a reply.

title: Java Full stack developer + Angular
description:
**Job Summary**
 The Sr. Software Engineer role is pivotal in designing developing and maintaining high\\-quality software solutions. With a focus on AWS SQL Spring Boot Angular JS Java JavaScript and mySQL the candidate will work in a hybrid model to deliver innovative solutions.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop robust and scalable software solutions using Java Spring Boot and Angular JS to meet business requirements.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design and implement cloud\\-based applications on AWS.
* Optimize SQL queries and database performance to ensure efficient data retrieval and storage.
* Implement front\\-end components using JavaScript and Angular JS to enhance user experience.
* Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to ensure code quality and maintainability.
* Troubleshoot and resolve software defects and issues to maintain system reliability.
* Participate in the full software development lifecycle from requirements gathering to deployment.
* Ensure software solutions are secure and compliant with industry standards and regulations.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers to foster team growth.
* Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve software solutions.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into technical specifications.
* Document software designs processes and procedures to facilitate knowledge sharing.
* Contribute to the companys mission by developing solutions that enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.


**Qualifications**
* Possess extensive experience in AWS enabling the design of scalable cloud solutions.
* Demonstrate proficiency in SQL and mySQL ensuring efficient database management.
* Exhibit strong skills in Java and Spring Boot for backend development.
* Showcase expertise in Angular JS and JavaScript for creating dynamic user interfaces.
* Have a solid understanding of software development best practices and methodologies.
* Display excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Show a commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

title: AWS DevOps Engineer
description:
**Job Summary**
 Join our dynamic team as a Senior Software Engineer where you will leverage your extensive experience in software development and cloud technologies to drive innovation and efficiency. You will be instrumental in designing developing and deploying cutting\\-edge solutions using a variety of tools and platforms. Your expertise will contribute to the enhancement of our services impacting both the company and our clients positively.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and implement high\\-quality software solutions using SOA Microservices and Python to meet business requirements and improve system performance.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design and deploy applications on AWS platforms including Lambda ECS and EKS ensuring scalability and reliability.
* Utilize Jenkins Docker and Kubernetes to automate deployment processes enhancing the efficiency and consistency of software releases.
* Lead the integration of testing frameworks such as Cucumber and Junit to ensure robust and reliable software delivery.
* Oversee the use of Gitlab and GITHUB for version control ensuring code integrity and facilitating seamless collaboration among team members.
* Implement and maintain continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines using Jenkins and AWS DevOps streamlining the development lifecycle.
* Conduct code reviews and utilize SONARQUBE to maintain high code quality and adherence to industry standards.
* Develop and execute shell scripts and Groovy scripts to automate routine tasks improving operational efficiency.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers fostering a culture of learning and innovation within the team.
* Engage in problem\\-solving and troubleshooting to resolve complex technical issues ensuring minimal disruption to services.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications aligning development efforts with business goals.
* Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies applying this knowledge to drive continuous improvement in software development practices.
* Contribute to the enhancement of consumer lending solutions leveraging domain expertise to deliver value\\-added services.


**Qualifications**
* Possess extensive experience in SOA Microservices and Python demonstrating a strong ability to develop scalable applications.
* Demonstrate proficiency in AWS services including Lambda ECS and EKS with a proven track record of successful deployments.
* Exhibit expertise in CI/CD tools such as Jenkins and AWS DevOps showcasing the ability to streamline development processes.
* Have a solid understanding of version control systems like Gitlab and GITHUB ensuring effective collaboration and code management.
* Show experience in using testing frameworks like Cucumber and Junit ensuring high\\-quality software delivery.
* Display knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes with experience in containerization and orchestration.
* Experience in consumer lending domain is a plus providing valuable insights into industry\\-specific challenges.

description:
This is
 **not a salaried role.** 




 It‚Äôs a

**Location:** 
 Bengaluru (Hybrid)
 



**Compensation:** 
**Equity\\-Based (2‚Äì5%)** 
 depending on skills, role \\& contribution

title: Developer III - javascript,node.js,java script toolkits,docker,
description:
**Role Description**
 What you ll need to bring to the party
   

  

* Programming Skills: Programming skills with Extensive knowledge of powerful programming languages like Javascript (NodeJS)
* Technology \\& Script: JavaScript (NodeJS), Web Services, Java script toolkits, Web/Application Servers, OO and relational modeling skills, docker.
* DB Skills: Basic DB administration experience (MariaDB, Redis).
* Networking: Understanding network topologies and common network protocols and services (DNS, HTTP(S), SSH).
* Experience with tools: Git, Jenkins or similar, Jira, Ansible.
* Agile Methodologies:. Usage of project management tools like Jira
* DevOps: Continuous integration and continuous deployment experience and exposure to DevOps practices
* Experience with various architectures: Domain Driven Design, Microservices, Cloud Native and Event Driven Architecture.
* Attitude to manage issues proactively including timely resolution and the identification of remediation opportunities
* Fail fast approach to align to product engineering standards What you ll be doing
* Analyzing product requirements and writing application code based on feature specification maintaining coding standards and security protocols
* Orchestrating the end\\-to\\-end deployment process, ensuring that all aspects of go\\-live are considered
* Investigating issue trends and devising solutions, Problem, Change Management and Release Management.
* Test and debug applications, to suggest mitigative actions and long\\-term fixes
* Prioritize and execute tasks in the product lifecycle as per laid guidelines
* Validate product functionality and security requirements
* We are looking for an individual who is energetic, engaged, and willing to actively participate with the right positive attitude.
* Expertise in working on Agile/Scrum team environment.
* Experience with testing: Unit Testing, Test Driven Development, Integration Testing, Load Testing, Test Automation.
* Responsible for automation \\& system provisioning, metrics, monitoring, scalability and security
* Owning \\& resolving production issues.
* 
* More about you
* 3\\-6 years of experience
* Constant curiosity and a desire to improve yourself and your fellow engineers.
* Experience in Cloud architecture (AWS) would be an advantage
* Experience in Nginx, fastify would be an advantage
* Experience in Angular, Node and React JS would be an advantage

title: Senior Google Retail Search Developer
description:
Minimum Qualifications: \\- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. \\- Proven experience in Google Retail Search and Elastic Search with a minimum of 5 years. Preferred Qualifications: \\- Experience in implementing Enterprise Search solutions. \\- Demonstrated ability to lead projects and work collaboratively in a team environment. \\- Strong analytical skills and a track record of leveraging data for strategic improvements. \\- Prior experience in developing scalable search architectures. \\- Familiarity with retail industry trends and search technology advancements. Good to have skills: Flask, Pandas, Data Analysis, Springboot, Hibernate.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities: \\- Develop and optimize Google Retail Search solutions to enhance user experience. \\- Implement and maintain Elastic Search capabilities to improve search accuracy and efficiency. \\- Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate Enterprise Search functionalities. \\- Analyze search data to drive improvements and ensure high\\-quality results. \\- Lead the design and execution of scalable search architectures.
